description: Manage Jira tickets and Confluence documentation
author: Atlassian
content: Access Jira and Confluence through a unified Atlassian MCP interface for project and documentation management.
features: Create and update Jira issues with custom fields
Search across both Jira and Confluence

steps: Add the Atlassian server configuration with SSE transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport sse atlassian https://mcp.atlassian.com/v1/sse

useCases: Link issues to wiki pages for context
security: Use JQL for precise query filtering
Regular backups recommended for critical data

troubleshooting.issue: HTTP 429 rate limit error starting November 2025
troubleshooting.solution: Atlassian enforces rate limits on API tokens from Nov 22, 2025. Check Retry-After and X-RateLimit-Reset headers. Implement caching, pagination, and webhooks to reduce API calls below token limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Free app rate limiting starting August 2025
troubleshooting.solution: Free apps rate limited from Aug 18, 2025, burst limits from Aug 28. Upgrade to paid tier for higher limits. Implement jitter on scheduled tasks and optimize JQL queries to reduce calls.

troubleshooting.issue: OAuth token authentication failed or expired
troubleshooting.solution: Re-authenticate via OAuth flow to get new token. Verify token hasn't been revoked in Atlassian admin settings. Check token scope includes required permissions for Jira and Confluence access.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot access project or issues - permission denied
troubleshooting.solution: Verify your Atlassian account has project access. Check project visibility settings allow API access. Ensure OAuth scope includes appropriate permissions (read:jira-work, write:jira-work).

troubleshooting.issue: JQL search queries returning no results or errors
troubleshooting.solution: Validate JQL syntax is correct using Jira's JQL builder. Check field names match custom field IDs. Verify search permissions for projects in query. Use /rest/api/3/search with proper authentication.
